title: GIVEAWAY: Take Our Survey for a Chance to Win a Set of Continental Tires
content:
BikeTiresDirect is giving three lucky winners their choice of new Continental tires just in time for your spring rides.

Whether you ride road, gravel, or mountain — Continental makes tires to handle those conditions with speed and traction. These include the Grand Prix 5000 S TR Road Tire, the gravel-specific Terra Speed, and the Cross King ProTection MTB Tire. With possibly the widest selection anywhere, BikeTiresDirect carries all of these and more from Continental and other top brands.

Answer the short survey for the folks at BikeTiresDirect for a chance to win, and read more about the three different tires you can choose from if you’re one of the lucky three winners below!

Continental Tires

Road: Continental says its Grand Prix 5000 S TR Road Tire is 20% faster, 28% more puncture-proof, & 50 grams lighter than the previous GP5000 tubeless model thanks to ditching an inner liner. It’s also race-proven with several years and many miles under its belt, making it one of the brand’s best tires.

Gravel: The Continental Terra Speed is a 700c all-rounder with evenly-spaced hexagonal-shaped tread blocks and horizontal siping towards the shoulders for steering and control over loose terrain. It’s the faster of the brand’s two gravel-centric tires, taking design cues from mountain tires.

Its Revolution Tubeless Ready casing with ProTection layering features 3-layer, 180tpi sidewalls, and 4-layer 240tpi under the tread. It has a tacky grip for traction in dry and damp conditions alike, countered with Continental’s premium BlackChili Compound known for its balance of grip and speed.

Mountain: The Continental Cross King ProTection MTB Tire rolls fast for cross-country racing and riding with the trail durability you’d expect. It has a tacky grip and the brand’s BlackChili compound to minimize rolling resistance for sturdy, reliable all-around traction.

So how do you win a pair? Answer the questions below for your chance!
